commit message: Merged '26427ca' from develop: Updated translations

added todays statistics in a new Fragment type with a WebView,
Small due chart changed to new chart engine,
moved ChartView in main package
updated statistic Fragment layout context
prepareDrawables is now only called once as long no additional drawables are added
put options menu relevant methods to abstract base Fragment.
fixed 'web page not available' on older devices for today statistics

Merge pull request #435 from trashcutter/stats_today

Added Today statistics, removed achartengine dependence from smal due chart
added option menu/action bar items to switch deck and time period of statistics, close #3
removed spinnermode (was min API level 11)
fixed encoding in Today statistics WebView, made ProgressBar match_parent and center

Use a set when building the correct string for the type::cloze function.
Also cut out the hint from the correct string.

Merge pull request #438 from trashcutter/stats_add_deck_and_time_action_provider

stats: added option menu/action bar items to switch deck and time period

Merge pull request #440 from ospalh/feature-cloze-fixes

Better type clozes
Disable messing with cliboard when no lookup dictionary selected, and show hint when user long-clicks while dictionary lookup enabled

Merge pull request #436 from timrae/dictionary_lookup

Fix up clipboard
